page.title: 05EDUCATION LOCAL AREA SURVEY
page.content: {COLDEAN JUNIOR SCHOOL.}For 7-11 year olds,with 180 on roll.A cash cafeteria operates as well as facilities for packed lunch.A policy of work outdoors is encouraged and visits are arranged frequently.There are lunchtime clubs and after school activities. {PATCHAM FAWCETT SCHOOL.}With 790 boys on roll from September 1985.Pupils are seperated in 3 broad Ability Bands. Audio Visual Aids and computer assisted learning techniques operate. Emphasis is on sports,P.E. ,Swimming, Careers and Health Education are included in the broad curriculum. {PATCHAM FIRST SCHOOL.}With 174 pupils. there are 9 full-time and 8 part-time teachers.Sports include rounders and football. {WESTDENE SCHOOL.}With 265 pupils.There are 11 full-time and 3 part-time teachers.Sports iclude rugby & cricket
